gui.dragonminez.character_creation.title: Create your character to begin your adventure
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.title: STATISTICS
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.str.desc: §7Increases your melee damage. At more damage, more Stamina you will spend.
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.res.desc: §7Increases you maximum Stamina and reduces the damage you take from enemies.
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.pwr.desc: §7Increases your Ki Damage. At more damage, more Ki you will spend.
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.melee_da: The damage you deal to enemies.
Increasing Strength increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.strike_d: Increasing Strike Power increases this value by %s per point
Increasing Resistance increases this value by %s per point
The damage you nullify from enemies.
Increasing Resistance increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.health.t: Increasing Vitality increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.ki_damag: The damage you deal to enemies with your Ki Attacks.
Increasing Ki Power increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.max_ener: Increasing Energy increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.customization.title: Character Customization
gui.dragonminez.hair_editor.title: Hair Editor
gui.dragonminez.quests.title: Quests
gui.dragonminez.config.title: Configuration
gui.dragonminez.training.title: Training
gui.dragonminez.spacepod.title: Space Pod
gui.dragonminez.lines.karin.name: Master Korin
gui.dragonminez.lines.karin.main: Welcome to Korin Tower, %s! Train hard and you will become stronger! Do you need anything from me?
gui.dragonminez.lines.guru.name: Elder Guru
gui.dragonminez.lines.guru.main: Greetings %s, I am Elder Guru, the wise leader of the Namekians. May I assist you in your journey?
gui.dragonminez.lines.guru.evil: You have become too evil. I will not help you unlock your Potential. Get out of my sight!
gui.dragonminez.lines.guru.level: You need to have your Potential Unlock skill at level 10 to unlock your Potential further.
gui.dragonminez.lines.dende.name: Dende
gui.dragonminez.lines.dende.main: Hello %s, I am Dende, the Guardian of Earth. How can I assist you today?
gui.dragonminez.lines.enma.name: King Yemma
gui.dragonminez.lines.enma.main: Welcome to the Otherworld, %s. I am King Yemma, the overseer of souls. Do you want to come back to Earth?
gui.dragonminez.lines.enma.revive: You need to talk to Fortuneteller Baba to be revived first!
gui.dragonminez.lines.baba.name: Fortuneteller Baba
gui.dragonminez.lines.baba.main: Greetings %s, I am Fortuneteller Baba. I can help you return to the world of the living. You need to wait %d more seconds before being able to revive.
gui.dragonminez.lines.baba.revived: §dFortuneteller Baba§r: You have been revived! Go back to §eKing Yemma§r to return to Earth.
gui.dragonminez.lines.popo.name: Mr Popo
gui.dragonminez.lines.popo.main: Welcome back to Kami's Lookout, %s. Can I help you with something? Maybe do you want to train or change your haircut?
gui.dragonminez.lines.popo.training: So you want to train, right? I can summon you a dummy, or we can practice your reflexes with a rhythm game. What do you choose?
gui.dragonminez.lines.gero.name: Dr. Gero
gui.dragonminez.lines.gero.main: Ah, a new test subject! I am Dr. Gero, the greatest scientific mind in the universe. The only one left of the Red Ribbon Army. I can offer you a unique opportunity...
gui.dragonminez.lines.gero.offer: I can convert you into an android, granting you immense power and unique abilities. However, this process comes with its own risks. Only for Human beings!
gui.dragonminez.lines.gero.confirm: Are you sure? This process is irreversible and you'll lose access to your old transformations, however, you'll gain access to a new world of power!
gui.dragonminez.lines.toribot.name: Toribot
gui.dragonminez.lines.toribot.main: Beep boop! I am Toribot, thanks for visiting me! It's kinda lonely here with King Kai...
gui.dragonminez.lines.generic.createchar: You need to create your character first.
wish.shenron.senzu.name: Senzu Beans
wish.shenron.tps.name: Training Points
wish.shenron.materials.name: Armor Materials
wish.shenron.materials.desc: Receive 32 Kikono Shards and 64 Iron Ingots.
wish.porunga.senzu.name: Senzu Beans
wish.porunga.tps.name: Training Points
wish.porunga.materials.name: Armor Materials
wish.porunga.materials.desc: Receive 64 Kikono Shards and 128 Iron Ingots.
race.dragonminez.human.desc: They are a terrestrial race with highly versatile combat skills. While they lack the innate power of other races, they are incredibly resourceful and tenacious. They stand out for their perseverance and courage, able to overcome their limitations through training and discipline.
race.dragonminez.saiyan.desc: They are a warrior race born for combat. Their innate ability to grow stronger after each battle makes them formidable opponents. They can even transform into powerful Super Saiyans and take their abilities to unimaginable levels.
race.dragonminez.namekian.desc: They are a peaceful yet powerful race, with great regenerative abilities and a natural connection to magic and nature. They are known for their wisdom, energy control, and their ability to fuse with others of their kind, increasing their power.
race.dragonminez.frostdemon.desc: They are a race of intergalactic conquerors with immense power and boundless cruelty. Their ability to transform and increase their power makes them formidable enemies. Despite their fragile appearance, they are some of the deadliest creatures in the universe.
race.dragonminez.bioandroid.desc: They are artificially created beings, combining the DNA of the most powerful races. With the ability to absorb other beings and increase their power to unimaginable levels, these creatures are adaptable and dangerous, designed to be invincible.
race.dragonminez.majin.desc: They are a magical and unpredictable race with enormous destructive potential, with a unique ability to regenerate and change form. Though they may seem playful or childish, they are extremely dangerous when they unleash their true power.
message.dragonminez.form.no_ki_instant: §cYou need at least %s §cKi to transform instantly.
message.dragonminez.racial.target_too_st: §cThe target is too strong to be absorbed or assimilated.
message.dragonminez.racial.limit_reached: §cYou have reached the limit of absorptions.
message.dragonminez.fusion.different_rac: §cYou can only fuse (Metamoru) with players of the same race.
message.dragonminez.fusion.level_gap: §cYou can only fuse (Metamoru) with a player similar in level to you.
message.dragonminez.gero.not_human: §cDr. Gero§r: Only humans can undergo android conversion.
message.dragonminez.gero.already_android: §cDr. Gero§r: You have already been converted to an android.
message.dragonminez.gero.upgrade_success: §cDr. Gero: §rAndroid conversion complete! Now let your power run wild!
item.dragonminez.might_tree_fruit: Fruit of the Tree of Might

item.dragonminez.pattern_goku2: Turtle Hermit School GI Pattern (Goku) (King Kai)

command.dragonminez.locate.not_found: §e[DMZ-Locate]§r Could not find a location for %s nearby.
command.dragonminez.locate.wrong_dimensi: §e[DMZ-Locate]§r You can't locate structures in another dimension.

dmz.quest.saiyan1.name: A New Beginning
dmz.quest.saiyan1.desc: Your adventure begins now. Find Master Roshi's house on a small island to start your training.
dmz.quest.saiyan2.name: A Saiyan's Threat
dmz.quest.saiyan2.desc: A powerful warrior named Raditz has arrived on Earth. Find him in the plains and defeat him.
dmz.quest.saiyan3.name: The Dragon Radar
dmz.quest.saiyan3.desc: After Raditz's defeat, a new threat looms. You must find the Dragon Balls to wish Goku back to life. First, get the Dragon Radar.
dmz.quest.saiyan4.name: Gather the Dragon Balls
dmz.quest.saiyan4.desc: With the Dragon Radar in hand, it's time to search for the seven Dragon Balls scattered across the world.
dmz.quest.saiyan5.name: The Saiyan Invasion
dmz.quest.saiyan5.desc: Two more powerful Saiyans, Vegeta and Nappa, have arrived. They've planted Saibamen in the plains. Defeat them before they cause more destruction.
dmz.quest.saiyan6.name: The Giant Saiyan
dmz.quest.saiyan6.desc: Nappa is a formidable opponent. Find him in the plains and put an end to his rampage.
dmz.quest.saiyan7.name: The Prince of All Saiyans
dmz.quest.saiyan7.desc: The final battle against the Saiyans is here. Face Vegeta in the rocky biomes and prove your strength.
dmz.quest.saiyan8.name: Giant Ape?!
dmz.quest.saiyan8.desc: Vegeta has transformed into a giant ape, Oozaru! This is his last resort. Defeat him and save the Earth.
dmz.quest.saiyan9.name: A New Horizon
dmz.quest.saiyan9.desc: With the Earth safe, a new journey awaits. Travel to the Ajissa Plains to prepare for the next threat.
dmz.quest.frieza1.name: A New Enemy
dmz.quest.frieza1.desc: A new threat has emerged in the Ajissa Plains. Find and defeat Cui, one of Frieza's soldiers.
dmz.quest.frieza2.name: The Namekian Village
dmz.quest.frieza2.desc: Frieza's forces are attacking a Namekian village. Go to the Ajissa Village and help them.
dmz.quest.frieza3.name: The Cruel Dodoria
dmz.quest.frieza3.desc: Dodoria, one of Frieza's most ruthless commanders, is causing chaos in the Ajissa Plains. Find and defeat him.
dmz.quest.frieza4.name: The Elegant Warrior
dmz.quest.frieza4.desc: Zarbon, Frieza's right-hand man, is searching for the Dragon Balls. Stop him.
dmz.quest.frieza5.name: The Prince's Ambition
dmz.quest.frieza5.desc: Vegeta has arrived on Namek seeking immortality. Confront him.
dmz.quest.frieza6.name: Zarbon's True Form
dmz.quest.frieza6.desc: Zarbon has revealed his monstrous transformation. Defeat him once and for all.
dmz.quest.frieza7.name: The Ginyu Force Arrives
dmz.quest.frieza7.desc: The elite Ginyu Force has arrived! Start by defeating Guldo, the weakest member.
dmz.quest.frieza8.name: Recoome's Rampage
dmz.quest.frieza8.desc: Recoome is incredibly strong. Take him down before he causes more damage.
dmz.quest.frieza9.name: The Fastest in the Universe
dmz.quest.frieza9.desc: Burter claims to be the fastest in the universe. Prove him wrong.
dmz.quest.frieza10.name: The Red Magma
dmz.quest.frieza10.desc: Jeice is the last of the Ginyu Force squad members. Defeat him.
dmz.quest.frieza11.name: Captain Ginyu
dmz.quest.frieza11.desc: Captain Ginyu, leader of the Ginyu Force, awaits. Be careful of his Body Change technique!
dmz.quest.frieza12.name: Body Change Chaos
dmz.quest.frieza12.desc: Ginyu has stolen Goku's body! Defeat him to restore order.
dmz.quest.frieza13.name: The Tyrant Appears
dmz.quest.frieza13.desc: Frieza himself has entered the battle. Face his first form.
dmz.quest.frieza14.name: Second Transformation
dmz.quest.frieza14.desc: Frieza has transformed! His power has increased dramatically.
dmz.quest.frieza15.name: Third Transformation
dmz.quest.frieza15.desc: Frieza's third form is even more terrifying. Stand your ground!
dmz.quest.frieza16.name: Final Form
dmz.quest.frieza16.desc: Frieza has reached his final form. This is the ultimate battle.
dmz.quest.frieza17.name: 100% Full Power
dmz.quest.frieza17.desc: Frieza is using 100% of his power! Finish him once and for all!
dmz.quest.frieza18.name: Return to Earth
dmz.quest.frieza18.desc: With Frieza defeated, it's time to return to Earth and prepare for future threats.
dmz.quest.android1.name: Frieza's Return
dmz.quest.android1.desc: Frieza has returned with an army! Defeat his soldiers.
dmz.quest.android2.name: Revenge of the Cold Family
dmz.quest.android2.desc: Mecha Frieza and King Cold have arrived on Earth seeking revenge. Stop them!
dmz.quest.android3.name: The Legendary Super Saiyan
dmz.quest.android3.desc: A mysterious Super Saiyan has appeared. Test your strength against him.
dmz.quest.android4.name: Goku's Home
dmz.quest.android4.desc: Visit Goku's house to learn more about the incoming android threat.
dmz.quest.android5.name: The Energy Absorber
dmz.quest.android5.desc: Android 19 can absorb energy! Be careful and defeat him.
dmz.quest.android6.name: Dr. Gero's Secret
dmz.quest.android6.desc: Dr. Gero, the creator of the androids, must be stopped.
dmz.quest.android7.name: The Twin Androids
dmz.quest.android7.desc: Androids 17 and 18 have been awakened. They're incredibly powerful!
dmz.quest.android8.name: The Monster Cell
dmz.quest.android8.desc: A bio-android named Cell has appeared. He's hunting the androids to achieve his perfect form.
dmz.quest.android9.name: Fusion of Warriors
dmz.quest.android9.desc: Piccolo has fused with Kami, and Android 17 stands in his way. Join the battle!
dmz.quest.android10.name: The Gentle Giant
dmz.quest.android10.desc: Android 16 was designed to destroy Goku. Face him in battle.
dmz.quest.android11.name: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
dmz.quest.android11.desc: Enter the Hyperbolic Time Chamber to train and grow stronger.
dmz.quest.android12.name: Cell Evolves
dmz.quest.android12.desc: Cell has absorbed Android 17 and transformed! He's after Android 18 next!
dmz.quest.android13.name: Pride of the Prince
dmz.quest.android13.desc: Vegeta has achieved a new level of Super Saiyan. Challenge him!
dmz.quest.android14.name: Future Warrior
dmz.quest.android14.desc: Trunks has pushed his power to the limit. Face him!
dmz.quest.android15.name: The Perfect Being
dmz.quest.android15.desc: Cell has achieved his Perfect Form. The Cell Games begin!
dmz.quest.android16.name: Gohan's Awakening
dmz.quest.android16.desc: Gohan has awakened his hidden power! Test his strength!
dmz.quest.android17.name: Cell's Children
dmz.quest.android17.desc: Cell has spawned Cell Juniors to torment the fighters. Destroy them!
dmz.quest.android18.name: Super Perfect Cell
dmz.quest.android18.desc: Cell has returned stronger than ever! End this threat once and for all!
dmz.quest.android19.name: Peace Restored
dmz.quest.android19.desc: With Cell defeated, peace has returned. Visit Kami's Lookout to celebrate.
quest.dmz.party.invite.self: §e[DMZ-Party]§r You cannot invite yourself to a party!
quest.dmz.party.invite.received: §e[DMZ-Party]§r You have been invited to join %s's party
quest.dmz.party.invite.accept.hover: Click to accept the party invitation
quest.dmz.party.invite.reject.hover: Click to reject the party invitation
quest.dmz.party.invite.none: §e[DMZ-Party]§r You have no pending party invitations
quest.dmz.party.leave.solo: §e[DMZ-Party]§r You are not in a party with other players
skill.dragonminez.fly.desc: Control your Ki to Fly! Jump and press the Fly Key mid-air to Fly, level up the skill to increase your speed.
skill.dragonminez.jump.desc: Let's you Jump higher. The more you level up, the higher you can jump.
skill.dragonminez.kisense.desc: Allows you to sense the ki of nearby entities, making it easier to locate them.
skill.dragonminez.kicontrol.desc: Learn to Control your Ki. It's a basic skill to use Ki Attacks.
skill.dragonminez.kimanipulation.desc: Master the Ki Manipulation to be able to create Ki Weapons, increasing your Melee Damage based on your Ki Damage!
skill.dragonminez.potentialunlock.desc: Let's you Unlock your real Potential to increase your power release to the limit!
skill.dragonminez.kaioken.desc: A powerful technique that multiplies your stats but strains your body.
skill.dragonminez.meditation.desc: Boosts your Passive Ki Regeneration and Stamina Recovery; Also reduces the Ki Cost of the Turbo Boost.
skill.dragonminez.superform.desc: Access to powerful transformations unique to your race.
skill.dragonminez.godform.desc: Access to divine transformations with godly ki.
skill.dragonminez.legendaryforms.desc: Access to rare and legendary transformations.
skill.dragonminez.fusion.desc: Learn the Fusion technique to combine powers with another warrior.
skill.dragonminez.androidforms.desc: Access to powerful android transformations (exclusive for upgraded humans).
advancements.dragonminez.root.title: DragonMine Z
advancements.dragonminez.root.descriptio: Thank you for downloading the Mod, hope you enjoy it!
advancements.dragonminez.invincible.desc: Obtain the Mark Grayson's Invincible suit.
advancements.dragonminez.kamilookout.des: Reach the Korin's Tower and Kami's Lookout near the Spawn.
advancements.dragonminez.gokuhouse.title: Mount Paozu
advancements.dragonminez.gokuhouse.descr: Reach the Goku's House in a Floating Island
advancements.dragonminez.roshihouse.desc: Reach the Kame House in a Floating Island
advancements.dragonminez.nimbus.title: For those with a Pure Heart
advancements.dragonminez.nimbus.descript: Mount into the Flying Nimbus obtained from Master Korin.
advancements.dragonminez.radar.title: Searching the Dragon Balls!
advancements.dragonminez.radar.descripti: Craft the Dragon Radar and start searching for the Dragon Balls.
advancements.dragonminez.dball1.title: The first Dragon Ball
advancements.dragonminez.dball7.title: Grant my Wish, Shenron!
advancements.dragonminez.dball7.descript: Find all the Dragon Balls and summon Shenron.
advancements.dragonminez.namekdim.title: A Planet full of Piccolos
advancements.dragonminez.namekdim.descri: Travel to the Planet Namek with a Saiyan Ship.
advancements.dragonminez.radarnamek.desc: Craft the Namekian Dragon Radar and start searching for the Namekian Dragon Balls.
advancements.dragonminez.namekballs.desc: Find all the Namekian Dragon Balls and summon Porunga.
advancements.dragonminez.kikono.title: Maleable Material?
advancements.dragonminez.kikono.descript: Find the Kikono Ore in the Namek Caves.
advancements.dragonminez.gete.title: Metal from the Big Star
advancements.dragonminez.gete.descriptio: Find the Gete Debris in the Big Star Gete.
advancements.dragonminez.armorstation.de: Craft the Armor Station and start crafting your own armor.
advancements.dragonminez.patternz.title: Your First Armor
advancements.dragonminez.patternz.descri: Craft the Blank Pattern (Z) and start crafting your own armor.
advancements.dragonminez.patternsuper.de: Craft the Blank Pattern (Super) and start crafting your own armor.
advancements.dragonminez.gokuarmor.title: The Saiyan born in Earth
advancements.dragonminez.gokuarmor.descr: Craft the Turtle Hermit School GI of Goku.
advancements.dragonminez.gotenarmor.desc: Craft the Turtle Hermit School GI of Goten.
advancements.dragonminez.greatsaiyamanar: Craft the Hero of Justice Armor of the Great Saiyaman.
advancements.dragonminez.futuregohanarmo: Craft the Turtle Hermit School GI of Future Gohan.
advancements.dragonminez.vegetaarmor.des: Craft the Saiyan Armor of Vegeta.
advancements.dragonminez.vegettoarmor.de: Craft the Inverted Turtle Hermit School GI of Vegito.
advancements.dragonminez.gogetaarmor.des: Craft the Metamoran Suit of Gogeta.
advancements.dragonminez.piccoloarmor.de: Craft the Demon GI of Piccolo.
advancements.dragonminez.demonbluegiarmo: Craft the Demon GI of Gohan.
advancements.dragonminez.bardockarmor.de: Craft the Saiyan Armor of Bardock (Z).
advancements.dragonminez.turlesarmor.des: Craft the Saiyan Armor of Turles.
advancements.dragonminez.tienarmor.title: The Tsuru-Sennin Student
advancements.dragonminez.tienarmor.descr: Craft the Crane School GI of Tien.
advancements.dragonminez.trunksarmor.des: Craft the Capsule Corp Jacket of Trunks (Z)
advancements.dragonminez.brolyarmor.desc: Craft the Saiyan Armor of Broly (Super).
advancements.dragonminez.shinarmor.title: The East Kaioshin
advancements.dragonminez.shinarmor.descr: Craft the Kaioshin Armor of Shin.
advancements.dragonminez.blackarmor.desc: Craft the Black Turtle Hermit School GI of Black Goku.
advancements.dragonminez.zamasuarmor.des: Craft the Kaioshin Armor of Zamasu.
advancements.dragonminez.fusionzamasuarm: Craft the Kaioshin Armor of Fusion Zamasu.
advancements.dragonminez.pridetroopsarmo: Craft the Pride Trooper Armor of U11.
advancements.dragonminez.hitarmor.title: The Infalible Assassin
advancements.dragonminez.hitarmor.descri: Craft the Assassin Armor of Hit.
advancements.dragonminez.gasarmor.title: The Heata Family
advancements.dragonminez.gasarmor.descri: Craft the Heata Family Armor of Gas.
advancements.dragonminez.majinbuuarmor.d: Craft the Majin Armor of Buu.
advancements.dragonminez.gammasarmor.des: Craft the Red Ribbon Armor of Gamma 1 § Gamma 2.
advancements.dragonminez.rockybiome.desc: Reach the Rocky Mountains Biome in the Overworld.
advancements.dragonminez.kaiosama.title: The North Kai
advancements.dragonminez.kaiosama.descri: Reach the King Kai's Planet in the Otherworld, crossing Snake Way.
advancements.dragonminez.patriarca.title: The Eldest Namek
advancements.dragonminez.patriarca.descr: Reach the Grand Elder Guru's House in Namek.
error.dmz.createcharacter: You must create your charactert first.
item.dragonminez.senzu_bean.cooldown: You must wait %s seconds before eating another Senzu Bean!
item.dragonminez.saiyan_ship.tooltip: §7This Ship from Saiyan Race can take you to other planets.
item.dragonminez.black_nimbus.tooltip: §7This cloud is only for those with a pure evil heart.
item.dragonminez.flying_nimbus.tooltip: §7This cloud is only for those with a pure heart.
item.dragonminez.namekdball_radar.toolti: §7Let's go catch the Namekian Dragon Balls!
item.dragonminez.might_tree_fruit.toolti: §7This fruit will give you a temporary power boost.
item.dragonminez.red_capsule.tooltip: §7Gives you §a+5 STR §7stat points to your attributes.
item.dragonminez.red_capsule.tooltip2: §7This capsule is used to increase your strength.
item.dragonminez.red_capsule.str.full: You have reached the maximum amount of STR.
item.dragonminez.yellow_capsule.tooltip: §7Gives you §a+5 SKP §7stat points to your attributes.
